item.title: 商务口语集锦四
item.description: - I think you should look over these figures again. 我想你应该再把这些数字核实一遍 - There are some calculations that are a bit off. 有些计算不太确切 - He'd like to know if you can send over those training manuals? 他想知道您能否将那些培训手册发过去？ - Oh, tell him I'll leave them at his office tomorrow afternoon. 噢，告诉他明天下午我把它们送到他的办公室 - I hate to do this to you, Alice, but I'm going to have to ask you to put in some more overtime.

item.title: 商务口语集锦三
item.description: - Can you all take a look at your schedules? 你们能看看你们的日程安排吗？ - Thursday mornings are usually the slowest around here. 星期四上午总是这儿最闲的时候。 - We're going to need everybody's input on this project. So I'd like to fix a time to meet next week and hear what you all have to say. 我们需要大家同心协力地投入到这个项目中来. 因此我想和大家定时间在下周开个会，听取各位的意见 - I do not have any problem with that. Let's set it up for 9:30 Wednesday morning. We can carry it over to Thursday if we need to.

item.title: 商务口语集锦二
item.description: - I just started a couple of weeks ago. 我几周前刚开始工作 - Well, if there is anything I can do for you, let me know. 如果有什么我能帮忙的，尽管开口 - When would you like me to send those plans over to your office? 你要我什么时候把这些计划送到你的办公室？ - It would be good if you could get them to me by Thursday afternoon. 你最好能在周四之前把他们交给我 - That'll be ahead of schedule! Good work. 这样就比计划提前了 - Well, as the saying goes: we aim to please!

item.title: 商务口语集锦一
item.description: - take the subway 坐地铁 - take the bus 乘公交车 - Thanks for the advice, I'll keep it in mind. 谢谢你的建议，我会记住的 - I had better head off though. 不过我得赶紧走了 - Sure, I'm heading out myself. 好，我也得走了 - Enjoy your evening. 祝晚上愉快 - Thanks for the warning. 谢谢你的提醒 - I've got a ton of stuff on my desk. 我桌上压成吨的活了 - But I'm really not in a position to make a decision right now.
